channel.title: Hard to explain, please read
channel.description: Okay, I've added a Custom Yell Channel Tag system to my server. But I wanted to make it so when you right click a player it shows that player's tag in front of their name. I tried doing this but instead it shows my own tag player's tag in front of their name. How would I go about making it so it shows their tag instead of mine? I tried something like o.CustomYellTag, but it doesn't recognize variable o. I tried making it work but I can't figure out how, can someone please give me a little walkthrough on how to do this? If so I would be-able to do so much more with my server, thanks!

item.title: Hard to explain, please read
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Lord Torax, post:9, topic:440695”][quote author=Tutorial link=topic=543370.msg3983222#msg3983222 date=1335549976]

If it doesn’t recognize ‘o’ [size=24pt]you can either import it or make it[/size]. Just saying. And I’ve also seen it to be ‘c2’

I believe that is also usable. I have separate variables though, I use o for my PvP system.
[/quote]

Yes I get this, but how do I set it up to work properly?[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Hard to explain, please read
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Lord Torax:

Okay, I’ve added a Custom Yell Channel Tag system to my server. But I wanted to make it so when you right click a player it shows that player’s tag in front of their name. I tried doing this but instead it shows my own tag player’s tag in front of their name. How would I go about making it so it shows their tag instead of mine? I tried something like o.CustomYellTag, but it doesn’t recognize variable o. I tried making it work but I can’t figure out how, can someone please give me a little walkthrough on how to do this? If so I would be-able to do so much more with my server, thanks!

Find out the variable name for the other player… I believe it is o.

Read full topic
